channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [added] Power Virtual Server Virtual Persistent Memory Volumes (power-iaas.vpmem-volume)
item.description: Provision flexible, secure, and scalable compute capacity for Power Systems enterprise workloads

item.title: [updated] watsonx.ai Runtime (pm-20) has changed the description of the plan named v2-professional
item.description:
*before*: CUH billing is based on CUH rate multiplied by the hours of consumption. Resource Units billing is based on the rate of the foundation model class multiplied by the number of tokens or data points used. For details on CUH rates, go to https://ibm.biz/wx-plans-ml For details on foundation model classes, go to https://ibm.biz/wx-plans-gen-ai
1 Resource Unit = 1000 tokens/data points
, *after*: CUH billing is based on CUH rate multiplied by the hours of consumption. Resource Units billing is based on the rate of the foundation model class multiplied by the number of tokens or data points used. For details on CUH rates, go to https://ibm.biz/wx-plans-ml For details on foundation model classes, go to https://ibm.biz/wx-plans-gen-ai
1 Resource Unit = 1000 tokens/data points
Looking for a HIPAA-Ready plan? The watsonx.ai Runtime HIPAA-Ready plan is available on IBM Cloud in the Dallas (us-south) region.To purchase, contact sales using this form: https://www.ibm.com/account/reg/signup?formid=MAIL-data
